programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep916
programme.desc: All Paws on Deck - Ryder calls on every member of the Paw Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus Celebration - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep916
programme.desc: All Paws on Deck - Ryder calls on every member of the Paw Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep315
programme.desc: The Great Animal Crown - When the Great Animal Crown is lost at the bottom of the ocean, Blaze transforms into a super-fast shark to retrieve it for his Animal Island friends. But he’ll have to swim fast – or Crusher may get to the crown first.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Fast Friends - Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meet a brand new monster machine named Watts - a super fast truck with electric tires! But when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Treasure of El Bravo - After Enrique steals the heart of El Bravo, there's only one person who can help Santi and crew save the day: Tomás's younger sister, Prima Tina!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep620
programme.desc: The Solar Light Spectacular! - When giant robot Buster steals all the batteries that power Solar City, which runs on the sun's energy, it's up to Solar Power Workers Nonny and Goby to stop him and get the lights back on before the big light show is cancelled!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep401
programme.desc: The New Doghouse! - When an accident destroys Bubble Puppy's doghouse, the Guppies team up with the entire neighborhood to build Bubble Puppy's dream home - the most tricked out doghouse Bubbletucky has ever seen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbababies' Birthday - It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Blue Makes a Movie with YOU! - Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep916
programme.desc: All Paws on Deck - Ryder calls on every member of the Paw Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay. // When Adventure Bay’s famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Steel In Space / That's Magic - Sir Steel wants to go to the moon and gets Professor Scratch to convert Steel Towers into a space rocket! // A magician steal the audience away from Rammy's martial arts performance. Peeved, Rammy meddles with his hat and triggers a rabbit invasion.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep227
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2 - The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Snow Squad to the Rescue! - When someone's stealing sleeping bags from campers, Gil is convinced a yeti is to blame! Will the Snow Squad catch the culprit?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Night of the Turtles / Santiago's Regatta - When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move. // Santi and crew struggle to win the Isla Encanto Regatta when Enrique starts to cheat.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Race for the Golden Treasure - Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt! Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Need for Blazing Speed - When Crusher tries to get Blazing Speed for himself, he accidentally sends Blaze's engine flying! Now it's Blaze vs. Crusher in a race for Blazing Speed-but without an engine, Blaze must find new ways to propel himself to victory.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Slobber Slug - A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep402
programme.desc: The Glitter Games! - Learn all about manners with the Guppies, as Molly helps aspiring princess Demanda get polite in time for the Glitter Games! Will they become true princesses together?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Costume Boxing! - At the height of Fashion Week in Bubbletucky, Molly performs in the quick-change dress-up match. Her skills land her on the cover of Dress-Up!, the hottest fashion mag in town!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Barbamartians - While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoedown / Pups Save Alex - It’s Adventure Bay Western Days, when a herd of cows escape from a train at the railway station! // When their friend Alex decides he wants to be a member of the PAW Patrol the PUPS and Ryder let him come along for the ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // It’s Chase’s birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Double Trouble / Box Not So Clever - In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: We're toast - The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Escape from Volcano Island! - Skipper Molly and First Mate Gil are shipwrecked on Volcano Island, and it's about to erupt! But when parts of their boat start to mysteriously disappear, will they be able to make it off the island in time?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Song Time with Blue - It's a music filled day at the Blue's Clues house as we try to figure out what song Blue wants to sing. On the way, we help Josh & Blue identify sounds of musical instruments and help chicks from the farm with their song show.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Growing with Blue - Come along as Josh, Blue and our friends learn that everything grows in different ways like fruits, vegetables, even you and Blue too! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what game Blue wants to play outside today.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Race to the Golden Gift - Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Treasure of El Bravo - After Enrique steals the heart of El Bravo, there's only one person who can help Santi and crew save the day: Tomás's younger sister, Prima Tina!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep110
programme.desc: Rain - A cloud appears in Teletubbyland and it rains. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch the flowers bloom. Another cloud appears and it rains pink, Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep15
programme.desc: Cloud - Dee encourages a friend to say 'cloud' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We explore rain clouds, snow clouds, funny clouds and someone even dresses up as a cloud!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: Twisty Turny - When HQ gets twisted up, tensions are stretched tight to fix the problem.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: It's time to see the moon - JoJo wonders why the moon is a funny shape. Gran Gran explains why the moon appears to change shape in the night sky, and together they make a moon diary for JoJo to take home.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Follow the Rules - Monty and Jimmy Jones learn how to play the Slides and Rainbows boardgame, but when Jimmy Jones keeps winning, Monty suggests changing the rules, and begins to wonder why games need rules at all.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Monsters - When Jimmy Jones is too scared of monsters to go under the bed to fetch a ball, Monty tells him that there's nothing to worry about and wonders, even if monsters really did live under the bed, how they could be sure they would even be scary.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep23
programme.desc: Queens - During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: The First Aid Badge - The squirrels are playing Copy the King when Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Luckily, Duggee has his First Aid badge, so he can bandage Tag up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: The Be Careful Badge - When Naughty Monkey starts throwing bananas down from his branch, Ethel slips and the squirrels investigate.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: The Big Parade Badge - Duggee and the squirrels help out when the leader of the Big Parade hurts his leg.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: The Colosseum, Italy - Glitch visits Rome to race his Grimbots in the Colosseum. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Lake Titicaca, South America - What goes up must come down! Grandmaster Glitch lands with a splash in Lake Titicaca in South America.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep22
programme.desc: Bus - During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep21
programme.desc: Escape - When Mum and Dad describe a made-up world where they can relax without the girls, Bluey and Bingo decide to burst into their fantasy and chase them down. How will Mum and Dad escape?

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Ophtalmosaurus & Painting - Andy plunges into an underwater prehistoric adventure in search of a giant swimming reptile the size of an elephant. However, after being chased by a shark, he finds himself lost at sea.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures (S2) Ep15
programme.desc: Robins - Rory and Sandy are in the garden birdspotting while Chantelle is listening for birds. Find out where robins fit in the food chain and try a Teeny Tiny Task - making a bird feeder.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S5) Ep18
programme.desc: Sluggy the Sea Slug - Captain Captain is excited to introduce her new pet, Sluggy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep42
programme.desc: The Birdwatching Badge - The dog is using his trusty binoculars to do some birdwatching and the squirrels want to have a go too, but Roly finds being very quiet is difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: The Puppet Show Badge - The dog and the squirrels arrange a puppet show to tell the story of a great adventure they had.

programme.desc: The Football Badge - After deciding to play football, Duggee starts the game by kicking the ball to the squirrels - who look at it blankly as they do not know what to do.

programme.desc: The Leaning Tower of Pisa, Italy - The Go Jetters race to fix the Leaning Tower of Pisa, but has it really been glitched?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: The Great Wall of China, China - Glitch and his grimbots have a long race on a very long wall - the Great Wall of China!

programme.title: Lost For Words Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's the midway point of the 9-week intensive program as these eight adult learners continue on their literacy journey as they implement new strategies into real life situations.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Nhill and Pyramid Hill lie 260km apart but are connected in the most surprising ways. These two old farming towns offer newcomers a fresh start and a fair go. Heather discovers the spin offs were surprising and unexpected.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep25
programme.desc: Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep45
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you comprehensive coverage from our reporters on the ground telling you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The Drum Ep30
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's lives everyday, encouraging thoughtful and challenging debate with a diverse panel. Presented by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep45
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: ABC News Ep62
programme.desc: News from where you live. ABC News SA brings you today's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on issues that matter to you. Presented by Richard Davies.

programme.title: China Tonight Ep2
programme.desc: The China Tonight team deliver a fresh look at news and current affairs from inside China. We dig beneath the headlines bringing more depth and complexity to the stories making it big in the world's most populous country.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep45
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. Our network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep45
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep5
programme.desc: With cost of living pressures increasing after nine consecutive interest rate rises, there's never been a more important time to keep track of your money. Rachel Pupazzoni looks at the week in business, finance and markets.

programme.title: The World Ep45
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: The Australian Wars Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - European immigration doubled in Tasmania, and so, too the death count as colonists encroached on the best land and Tasmanian Aboriginal people resisted their occupation.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep45
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep45

programme.title: Barrie Cassidy's One Plus One Ep3
programme.desc: Rebecca West was recently named one of the best teachers in the world. She talks to Barrie Cassidy about the difficulties her profession faced during COVID.

programme.title: Tech Smart Agriculture Ep3
programme.desc: Planting trees can help mitigate greenhouse gas emissions. But that's difficult in remote and inaccessible areas. An Australian company is trying to overcome with a drone which could plant up to forty thousand trees a day.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia Ep45
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Michael Parkinson interviews guests Lee Marvin, Dick Smith and Elkie Brooks.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Costa Georgiadis visits the home of permaculture, Sophie Thomson visits waterside accommodation for native bees, Tino Carnevale prunes stone fruit at The Patch and we explore Bundjalung country with Clarence Slockee.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep4
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep9
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote and finance with David Chau.

programme.title: ABC News Ep18
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep7
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep1
programme.desc: His ideas caught the eye of the US President. Now engineer Saul Griffith is making waves at home, joining his local community in an ambitious project to electrify their suburb and power it with renewables. (Return)

programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - After selling their medieval style family home known as the 'Sand Castle' in Perth's City Beach, Tani and pilot husband Tim have plan to build an 'earth castle' on their 60 acre property north of Perth.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep3

programme.desc: Tablets for Depression - Do Antidepressants Help? - Although antidepressants are prescribed with increasing frequency, their efficacy is the subject of debate. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Andrade vs. Blanchfield
programme.desc: Prelims - Flyweight phenom Erin Blanchfield continues her march to a title shot on February 18 when she faces off with former 115-pound champion Jessica Andrade in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. Unbeaten in the Octagon and fresh from a first-round finish of Molly McCann, New Jersey’s Blanchfield is seen as perhaps the top prospect in the entire UFC, and now she will face her toughest test to date in Brazil’s Andrade, who has won three bouts in a row on her way to the top of the 125-pound weight class

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Main Event - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion.
